page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: Braintree's crossroads have been an important landmark in the town's long history . Even today they are part of the town's one way system which Channels a considerable volume of traffic through Braintree. the Railway deals with the London commuter traffic which drives into Braintree and through the rest of the day the roads are busy. During a twenty minute survey it was found that 466 cars passed through Coggeshall Road followed by 40 vans and 28 lorries. The towns unusually named bus park is a large terminous for eastern national bus company and its green buses are a constant feature on the major roads. a one way system is planned but has been for twenty years.
